directions.step:
* Prepare Basic Holiday Cookie dough, with the following changes: Substitute 3/4 tsp. anise flavoring for vanila. Wrap in plastic and refrigerate until well chilled. For each cookie, roll 1 round teaspoon dough in pine nuts; you'll need about 1/2 cup nuts total. Place on ungreased baking sheets. Bake in 350 F. oven for 10-12 minutes. Cool on wire racks. Makes 24 cookies. MC formatting by bobbi744@sojourn.com
NOTES : (#) All cookies made with the Basic Holiday Cookies mix are marked in this way for ease in finding in cookbook. Recipe by: Family Circle, 11-18-97
Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #873 by Roberta Banghart <bobbi744@sojourn.com> on Oct 28, 1997
